column4: i have 2 hardisk with ubuntu as master and windows as slave... but is looks like cannot mount windows because it doesn't "exist", do i have to configure fstab or something?
what error does it giv eyou?
it doesn't see your windows drive as hdb5. Have you scanned your partition tabele to make sure that's where it really is?
I'm not sure. That error typically means that /dev/hdb5 is not associated with any hardware
